businessRules.rule:
DECLARE @Already_Exists BIT
SET @Already_Exists = 0
SELECT TOP 1 @Already_Exists = 1 FROM APP.Area_Entrega_Familia WHERE Area_Entrega_Id = @Area_Entrega_Id AND Familia_Id = @Familia_Id
IF @Already_Exists = 1 BEGIN SET @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 SET @Result_ShowViewMessage = [dbo].[fn_Obtener_Mensaje_Sistema](22,1,3,@Area_Entrega+' vs. '+@Familia_Clave) SET @Result_ShowAlert = @Result_ShowViewMessage RETURN END

DECLARE @Already_Exists BIT
SET @Already_Exists = 0
SELECT TOP 1 @Already_Exists = 1 FROM APP.Area_Entrega_Familia WHERE Area_Entrega_Id = @Area_Entrega_Id AND Familia_Id = @Familia_Id AND Area_Entrega_Familia_Id <> @Area_Entrega_Familia_Id
IF @Already_Exists = 1 BEGIN SET @BusinessRules_PreventDefault = 1 SET @Result_ShowViewMessage = [dbo].[fn_Obtener_Mensaje_Sistema](23,1,3,@Area_Entrega+' vs. '+@Familia_Clave) SET @Result_ShowAlert = @Result_ShowViewMessage RETURN END
